response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience. This product is a testament to our commitment to excellence and innovation. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $80. Considering its value, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at $100. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Thank you for your time and consideration.", "product_price": 100}
